attributes.action: Hazard Pay for frontline workers required to work during COVID 19
attributes.additional_details: Because frontline workers are helping people and country to continue operating as normal as possible while being made to take risk of infection from COVID 19 where non frontline workers aren’t
attributes.background: To encourage work places or government fund to pay additional Hazard pay to frontline workers who are still required to work during COVID 19

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
